title: Er­do­gan says Turk­ish elec­tions to be held on May 14
text: The op­po­si­tion has blamed Turkey’s eco­nom­ic down­turn and an ero­sion of civ­il rights and free­doms on the 68-year-old Er­do­gan, say­ing the re­vised gov­ern­ment sys­tem amounts to “one-man rule”.

title: Turkey’s in­fla­tion jumped to 24-year high of 79.6 per­cent in July
